Marshall, Essex funeral

W. Marshall, The true mannor and forme of the proceeding to the funerall of the Right Honourable Robert Earle of Essex and Ewe, Viscount Hereford, Lord Ferrers of Chartley, Bourghchier and Lovaine. Late Lord Generall of the forces raised and employed by the Parliament of England, who dyed at Essex House on Munday the 14 day of Septemb. 1646.
